titles.title: A bill to redesignate the railroad station located at 2955 Market Street in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, commonly known as "30th Street Station", as the "William H. Gray 30th Street Station".
A bill to redesignate the railroad station located at 2955 Market Street in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, commonly known as "30th Street Station", as the "William H. Gray 30th Street Station".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Designates the railroad station located at 2955 Market Street in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, commonly known as 30th Street Station, as the "William H. Gray 30th Street Station."
Bars the use of federal funds to modify signage at the station or for related activities necessitated by its redesignation.
